titles.title: Reliable Investment in Vital Energy Reauthorization Act
RIVER Act
A bill to amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to reauthorize hydroelectric production incentives and hydroelectric efficiency improvement incentives, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
5/11/2015--Introduced. Reliable Investment in Vital Energy Reauthorization Act or the RIVER Act
This bill amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to extend through FY2025 appropriations for hydroelectric production incentives and for incentive payments to the owners or operators of hydroelectric facilities at existing dams to make capital improvements directly related to improving efficiency.
